verses.name: Genesis 11:1
verses.text: And the whole earth was of one language, and of one speech.

verses.name: Genesis 11:2
verses.text: And it came to pass, as they journeyed from the east, that they found a plain in the land of Shinar; and they dwelt there.

verses.name: Genesis 11:3
verses.text: And they said one to another, Go to, let us make brick, and burn them throughly. And they had brick for stone, and slime had they for morter.

verses.name: Genesis 11:4
verses.text: And they said, Go to, let us build us a city and a tower, whose top may reach unto heaven; and let us make us a name, lest we be scattered abroad upon the face of the whole earth.

verses.name: Genesis 11:5
verses.text: And the Lord came down to see the city and the tower, which the children of men builded.

verses.name: Genesis 11:6
verses.text: And the Lord said, Behold, the people is one, and they have all one language; and this they begin to do: and now nothing will be restrained from them, which they have imagined to do.

verses.name: Genesis 11:7
verses.text: Go to, let us go down, and there confound their language, that they may not understand one another’s speech.

verses.name: Genesis 11:8
verses.text: So the Lord scattered them abroad from thence upon the face of all the earth: and they left off to build the city.

verses.name: Genesis 11:9
verses.text: Therefore is the name of it called Babel; because the Lord did there confound the language of all the earth: and from thence did the Lord scatter them abroad upon the face of all the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 11:10
verses.text: These are the generations of Shem: Shem was an hundred years old, and begat Arphaxad two years after the flood:

verses.name: Genesis 11:11
verses.text: And Shem lived after he begat Arphaxad five hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:12
verses.text: And Arphaxad lived five and thirty years, and begat Salah:

verses.name: Genesis 11:13
verses.text: And Arphaxad lived after he begat Salah four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:14
verses.text: And Salah lived thirty years, and begat Eber:

verses.name: Genesis 11:15
verses.text: And Salah lived after he begat Eber four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:16
verses.text: And Eber lived four and thirty years, and begat Peleg:

verses.name: Genesis 11:17
verses.text: And Eber lived after he begat Peleg four hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:18
verses.text: And Peleg lived thirty years, and begat Reu:

verses.name: Genesis 11:19
verses.text: And Peleg lived after he begat Reu two hundred and nine years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:20
verses.text: And Reu lived two and thirty years, and begat Serug:

verses.name: Genesis 11:21
verses.text: And Reu lived after he begat Serug two hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:22
verses.text: And Serug lived thirty years, and begat Nahor:

verses.name: Genesis 11:23
verses.text: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:24
verses.text: And Nahor lived nine and twenty years, and begat Terah:

verses.name: Genesis 11:25
verses.text: And Nahor lived after he begat Terah an hundred and nineteen years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:26
verses.text: And Terah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran.

verses.name: Genesis 11:27
verses.text: Now these are the generations of Terah: Terah begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran; and Haran begat Lot.

verses.name: Genesis 11:28
verses.text: And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity, in Ur of the Chaldees.

verses.name: Genesis 11:29
verses.text: And Abram and Nahor took them wives: the name of Abram’s wife was Sarai; and the name of Nahor’s wife, Milcah, the daughter of Haran, the father of Milcah, and the father of Iscah.

verses.name: Genesis 11:30
verses.text: But Sarai was barren; she had no child.

verses.name: Genesis 11:31
verses.text: And Terah took Abram his son, and Lot the son of Haran his son’s son, and Sarai his daughter in law, his son Abram’s wife; and they went forth with them from Ur of the Chaldees, to go into the land of Canaan; and they came unto Haran, and dwelt there.

verses.name: Genesis 11:32
verses.text: And the days of Terah were two hundred and five years: and Terah died in Haran.
